# Introduction

`RNAmodR.Data` contains just example data for the `RNAmodR` and related 
packages. The data is provided as gff3, fasta and bam files.

Four sets of data with multiple files are included
```{r, echo=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(RNAmodR.Data)
})
```
```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(RNAmodR.Data)
```

```{r}
RNAmodR.Data.example()
RNAmodR.Data.RMS()
RNAmodR.Data.AAS()
RNAmodR.Data.man()
```
